meanings.definition: The quality of being able to adjust to new conditions or circumstances.
meanings.sent1: Her adaptivity helped her quickly learn the new software at work.
meanings.sent2: The team's success was due to their adaptivity in handling unexpected challenges.
meanings.sent3: The robot's adaptivity to different terrains made it a popular choice for exploration.
meanings.sent4: His adaptivity was like a chameleon blending seamlessly into its surroundings.
meanings.sent5: The adaptivity of the plant to various climates fascinated the botanist.
